name: tranzr-monorepo

scripts.reset: rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf apps/*/node_modules && rm -rf packages/*/node_modules && pnpm install

preinstall: node -e "if (!process.env.npm_config_user_agent || !process.env.npm_config_user_agent.includes('pnpm')) { console.error('Use pnpm to install dependencies.'); process.exit(1); }"
